doc.title: One of the Girls
doc.plot: Tyler Moore is the quintessential guy who just can't seem to catch a break, especially when it comes to women. Tyler is a twenty-something, entry-level Graphic Designer who struggles in the fracas between his estrogen-powered soul mates, Allison, Elizabeth and Jennifer, and his ego-driven, testosterone-charged com-padre, Chad. Tyler is the typical boy next-door type of "nice guy", and as the old axiom warns, nice guys finish last. Can Tyler, against seemingly supernatural forces, succeed at being the first nice guy to finish first?
